description: A quick and healthier alternative to regular biscuits.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prick the sweet potato and cook in the microwave for about 5-6 minutes.
Once the potato is soft, scoop out the insides and mash it in a bowl.
Add your melted butter, self-raising flour and cinnamon to the bowl.
Mix everything together to form a dough (using your hands is often the easiest way!)
Roll out the dough on a floured surface.
Cut into shapes with your cookie cutters and place them on a lined baking tray.
Bake in the oven for approximately 10 minutes until golden.
